mapper.sql: eid, role_id, station_id, esex, eage, `ename`, etelephone, eaddress, eusername, `epassword`, `ecomment`, eavailable,etime
mapper.select: select * from employee e,station s,role r where e.role_id=r.rid and e.station_id=s.sid and e.eid=#{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into employee (role_id, station_id, esex, eage, ename, etelephone, eaddress, eusername, epassword, ecomment, eavailable,etime) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{esex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{epassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eavailable,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into employee
role_id,
station_id,
esex,
eage,
ename,

ecomment,

mapper.update:
update employee
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
esex = #{esex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eage = #{eage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
etelephone = #{etelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eaddress = #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eusername = #{eusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epassword = #{epassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ecomment = #{ecomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eavailable = #{eavailable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
etime=#{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, esex = #{esex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eage = #{eage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etelephone = #{etelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eaddress = #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eusername = #{eusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, epassword = #{epassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ecomment = #{ecomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eavailable = #{eavailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from (employee e left join station s on s.sid=e.station_id),role r WHERE r.rid=e.role_id

select * from (employee e left join station s on s.sid=e.station_id),role r
r.rid=e.role_id
and ename like concat('%',#{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select * from employee e,role r,station s where e.station_id=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and e.role_id=r.rid and r.rid=2 and s.sid=e.station_id
